alert.note: Alert for Sterling (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 11:20PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sterling County through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1119 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Forsan, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Sterling County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for west central Texas.
